home.subtitle: High-quality PET bottles, jars and caps for food, cosmetics, chemical and pharmaceutical sectors. We serve you with custom design and wholesale advantages.
home.categoriesSubtitle: Discover our high-quality plastic packaging solutions for every sector. From standard products to custom design.
home.whyUsSubtitle: The values and advantages behind our position among the industry's leading companies.
home.aboutLead1: Since our founding, Kismet Plastik has been offering quality and trust in the plastic packaging sector. We are among the industry's leading companies with our modern production facility, experienced team and customer-focused approach.
home.aboutLead2: We support our B2B partners' growth by providing custom production, wholesale and technical support services.
home.sectorsSubtitle: We offer standards-compliant plastic packaging solutions tailored to different sector needs.
home.ctaSubtitle: Contact us for plastic packaging solutions that meet your needs. Our expert team will offer you the best solution.

homeFeatures.modernFactoryDesc: High-capacity production at our facility equipped with state-of-the-art machinery.
homeFeatures.qualityAssuranceDesc: Production to international quality standards with ISO 9001, ISO 22000 and FSSC 22000 certifications.
homeFeatures.ecoFriendlyDesc: Environmentally conscious approach with recyclable materials and sustainable production processes.
homeFeatures.fastDeliveryDesc: On-time delivery of your orders with our fast and secure nationwide logistics network.
homeFeatures.highCapacityDesc: We meet large-scale orders with monthly production capacity in the millions.
homeFeatures.supportDesc: Our expert team is with you at every stage, before and after sales.

homeStrengths: Expertise in food, cosmetics, chemical and pharmaceutical sectors
Mold design and custom production capability
Competitive pricing and flexible payment options

homeCategories.name: PET Bottles
homeCategories.description: PET bottles in various volumes and designs for food, beverage and cosmetics sectors.

homeCategories.name: Jars
homeCategories.description: Wide-mouth PET jars for honey, jam, sauce and other food products.

homeCategories.name: Caps
homeCategories.description: Standard and custom cap varieties for all types of bottles and jars.

homeCategories.name: Preforms
homeCategories.description: High-quality PET preforms for your own production line.

homeCategories.name: Custom Production
homeCategories.description: Custom design and production solutions for your brand, from mold design to production.

homeCategories.name: Packaging Sets
homeCategories.description: Complete packaging solution packages including bottle, cap and label.

homeSectors.name: Food & Beverage
homeSectors.description: Hygienic packaging solutions for water, juice, sauce, honey, jam and other food products.

homeSectors.name: Cosmetics
homeSectors.description: Aesthetically designed bottles for shampoo, lotion, cream and perfume sector.

homeSectors.name: Chemical
homeSectors.description: Durable packaging solutions for cleaning products and industrial chemicals.

homeSectors.name: Pharmaceutical
homeSectors.description: Safe and hygienic packaging products compliant with pharmaceutical standards.

homeSectors.name: Personal Care
homeSectors.description: Modern designs for body care, hair care and skin care products.

homeSectors.name: Industrial
homeSectors.description: Custom production packaging for oil, fuel, agrochemicals and industrial liquids.

products.title: All Products
products.subtitle: Browse our PET bottles, jars, caps and preform products. Use filters and search to easily find the product that suits your needs.

about.heroSubtitle: The address of quality and trust with over 20 years of experience in the plastic packaging sector.
about.storyTitle: The Name You Trust in Plastic Packaging
about.storyP1: Kismet Plastik was founded in Istanbul in 2004. Since our founding, we have been producing high-quality PET bottles, jars and caps for the food, cosmetics, chemical and pharmaceutical sectors.
about.storyP2: We are among the industry's leading companies with our modern production facility, experienced team and customer-focused approach. We offer custom production, wholesale and technical support services to our B2B customers.
about.missionText: To be a reliable and innovative brand in the sector by offering the highest quality plastic packaging solutions to our customers.
about.visionText: To be the leading company in the plastic packaging sector in Turkey and the region; to make a difference with sustainable and eco-friendly production.
about.valueQualityDesc: Production to international standards with ISO 9001, ISO 22000 and FSSC 22000 certifications.
about.valueSustainabilityDesc: Recyclable materials and environmentally conscious production processes.
about.valueInnovationDesc: State-of-the-art machinery and constantly evolving product portfolio.
about.valueCustomerDesc: Pre and post-sales technical support, custom design and flexible solutions.
about.certsSubtitle: We produce in compliance with international quality and food safety standards.

contact.heroSubtitle: Contact us for your questions or quote requests. Our expert team will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.addressValue: Organized Industrial Zone, 1st Street No: 15, Istanbul
contact.formSuccess: Your message has been received. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

quality.heroSubtitle: We produce to international standards and guarantee quality at every stage.
quality.certsSubtitle: All our production processes are certified in compliance with international standards.
quality.processSubtitle: We apply rigorous quality control processes at every stage from raw materials to shipment.
quality.step1Desc: All raw materials from suppliers undergo laboratory testing.
quality.step2Desc: Quality parameters are continuously monitored and recorded at every production stage.
quality.step3Desc: Finished products undergo pressure, leak, dimensional and visual tests.
quality.step4Desc: Final quality control before packaging, shipped under appropriate conditions.
quality.labDesc: We guarantee the quality and safety of our products through tests conducted in our modern laboratory.

quote.heroSubtitle: Get a free quote for plastic packaging solutions that meet your needs. Fill out the form and our expert team will get back to you.
quote.formHint: Completing all fields will speed up the quote process.
quote.successMessage: We will contact you as soon as possible. Thank you.

dealer.heroSubtitle: Access order management, price lists and exclusive campaigns with your dealer account.
dealer.benefitsTitle: Why Become a Kismet Plastik Dealer?
dealer.benefitsDesc: Grow your business with exclusive benefits. We are with you with strong brand support, competitive pricing and comprehensive product range.
dealer.benefitPricingDesc: Dealer-exclusive discounted prices and wholesale advantages.
dealer.benefitOrdersDesc: Online order creation, tracking and past order viewing.
dealer.benefitSupportDesc: Dedicated account manager and technical support line for dealers.
dealer.benefitRegionDesc: Exclusive authorized dealer privilege in your designated region.
dealer.notActiveYet: This feature is not yet active. Please contact us.

faq.heroSubtitle: Find answers to your questions. If you can't find what you're looking for, contact us.
faq.notFoundDesc: Our expert team is here for all your questions.

production.heroSubtitle: High-capacity, quality production with state-of-the-art machinery and experienced team.
production.processSubtitle: Quality and efficiency are at the forefront at every stage of our production process.

career.heroSubtitle: Join the Kismet Plastik family. Take your place in our growing team and shape your career with us.
career.positionsTitle: Find the Right Position for You
career.spontaneTitle: Can't find the position you're looking for?
career.spontaneDesc: Send us your resume and we'll contact you when a suitable position opens.

blog.heroSubtitle: News, guides and informative content from the plastic packaging sector.

catalog.heroSubtitle: Download our product catalogs to review our full product range in detail.
catalog.printedDesc: Submit your printed catalog request and we'll send it to your address for free.

footer.brandDesc: At Kismet Plastik, we have been offering quality and innovative solutions in the plastic packaging sector for years. We provide custom production and wholesale services to our B2B customers.
